ygData.subject: RE: Play the damn mana song (was: RE: [eqbards] Proposal to chang e how ...)
ygData.msgSnippet: ROFL Steve hahahaa... thats a great story :)
ygData.messageBody:
ROFL Steve hahahaa... thats a great story :)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Stephen E. McCloskey [mailto:s.mccloskey@...]
> Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 7:12 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Play the damn mana song (was: RE: [eqbards] Proposal
> to change
> how ...)
>
>
> Ugggg. Last night was the first time someone actually said
> to me, "just
> play mana song". I always thought I wouldn't get insulted
> but I did. I
> told him that he had to be kidding, it's going to take longer
> to kill the
> mobs and you will be healing more. He was the only caster in
> the group, so
> I choose to buff the melee people. After a couple minutes of
> arguing about
> it (he found out I was right) he said, "got to log, bye".
>
> The mana song is a blessing and a curse. Get a friggin'
> enchanter if you
> want constant mana regen.
>
> -Steve
> 38 bard
>
